dedicatedCloud_vm_encryption_add_kms_ip_: Invalid format (e.g. 192.168.0.1 and 0-255 for each block).
dedicatedCloud_vm_encryption_add_kms_con: I have read and understood the VM Encryption documentation as well as the actions I will need to take.
dedicatedCloud_vm_encryption_kms_add_err: An error has occurred adding the KMS server: {{error}}
dedicatedCloud_vm_encryption_add_kms_con: Please start configuring your KMS server via the vSphere client.
Once you have finished configuring your server, the setup will continue automatically and you can track its progress in this window.  Detection may take up to one minute.
If you need any help, please refer to the documentation.
dedicatedCloud_vm_encryption_kms_added: The KMS server has been added.
